mapper.select: select a.ta_no as ta_no, a.co_no as co_no, c.p_no as p_no,c.p_name as p_name, to_char(a.ta_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:Mi') as reservedate, substr(c.p_rnum,0,8) as p_rnum, a.ta_name as rsv_name, a.ta_content as ta_content, c.p_sex as p_sex from co_task a, co_med b, patient c where a.co_no = b.co_no and b.p_no = c.p_no and a.d_id = #{dId} and to_char(a.ta_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.ta_status = 1 and a.reserv_yn = 'N'
select a.ta_no, a.co_no, a.d_id, a.ta_name, a.ta_content, a.ta_date, a.ta_status, a.reserv_yn, b.co_doc from co_task a, co_med b where a.co_no = b.co_no and ta_no = #{taNo}
SELECT sub_no, ta_no, sub_name, sub_date, complete_yn, l_file, l_path, l_type, end_day, start_day, color FROM sub_task where ta_no = #{taNo}
